title: Grotesk sans-serif from Vitamin Green
content:
I did some searching and couldn't figure out what sans-serif is being used in [Phaidon's Vitamin Green](http://web.archive.org/web/20150320213815/http:/ca.phaidon.com/store/architecture/vitamin-green-9780714862293/). I was hoping I could find the book designer's (Julie Kim) website and get more info that way but no luck.

Font: 

 Galaxie Polaris 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150320213815/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

comments.content: Thanks for the fast response Ryuk.
